definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Group messaging is also going to be vastly improved.
sentences.chinese: 羣發短信功能也將大加改善。

sentences.english: But can there be any sense in texting toddlers?
sentences.chinese: 但是，這對於向小孩發短信有意義嗎？

sentences.english: Collections of short jokes especially written for texters are best-sellers.
sentences.chinese: 那些專門爲短信族編寫的短篇笑話集也十分暢銷。

sentences.english: Turn off the phone and ignore incoming texts.
The company also defended the sacking-by-text message(10) as a way to keep the modern.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司還辯解到，短信解聘也是跟上時代的做法。

sentences.english: Phone calls and texts are great for private, personal chats.
sentences.chinese: 電話，短信對於私密，個人間的聊天非常不錯。

sentences.english: I asked him about it he said "I don't know what you're talking about Megan".
sentences.chinese: 我回短信問他怎麼回事兒，他說“你說什麼哪梅根”。

sentences.english: So far, 952 people have agreed to be notified of their test results by text messenge.
sentences.chinese: 迄今爲止，已有952人同意通過短信獲知檢驗結果。

sentences.english: your time spent on text messages and phone calls if they are not related to work.-Keep
sentences.chinese: 不要把時間無謂地花在與工作無關的短信和電話上。

sentences.english: Usually, teenagers only use their phone for texting, calling.
sentences.chinese: 通常，青少年只用手機來發短信，和通話。

sentences.english: Some people will text message friends or watch videos on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 有些人立馬給朋友發短信或是在線看片。

sentences.english: Not answering your phone calls or texts?
sentences.chinese: 她沒有回你電話或者短信？

sentences.english: She's texting too and occasionally nodding off.
sentences.chinese: 她還在一邊發短信，偶爾打個盹。

sentences.english: I live in a place where they've recently banned the use of mobile phones while driving, with additional penalties for texting.
sentences.chinese: 在我住的地方開車時你不能打手機，發短信也會加罰。

sentences.english: The amounts they sent were smaller, the notes that accompanied them more inquisitive.
sentences.chinese: 這些學生寄來的錢很少，附上的短信更加刨根問底。

sentences.english: You can email or text, romantically cute love quotes to your love mate to express your love gestures.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過郵件或短信，把浪漫情話傳達給你的愛人。

definition: to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)
newsletter/the news in brief/(Tw) SMS message
to transfer (money to a bank account)

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
